'''Dwebble''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''イシズマイ''' ''Ishizumai'') is a dual-type {{2t|Bug|Rock}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation V]].

It [[Evolution|evolves]] into {{p|Crustle}} starting at [[level]] 34.

==Biology==
[[File:Dwebble no rock.png|thumb|left|240px|Dwebble without its rock]]
Dwebble is a small, orange hermit crab-like Pokémon with large pincers. It has dark, oval-shaped eyes supported by eye stalks. It has a hook-like tail that is concealed underneath the sectioned chunk of gray rock it uses as a shell. This tail is possibly used to keep the rock in place or to carve itself a new home should its old rock get lost. When finding a rock to use as its shell, Dwebble inspects the rock to see if it can be used, then it digs a hole in the rock's bottom. It can expel a corrosive spray from its mouth to dissolve or mend rocks. This spray can ease carving. If the rock breaks, it won't calm down until it can find another rock to replace it. It lives in the desert.

==In the anime==
===Major appearances===
====[[Cilan's Dwebble]]====
[[File:Cilan Dwebble.png|250px|thumb|left|Dwebble in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
{{an|Cilan}} captured Dwebble after helping it retrieve its shell from a trouble making trio of Dwebble in ''[[BW011|A Home for Dwebble!]]''. Since then, Cilan has used Dwebble in various battles and was the Pokémon Cilan chose to use in the first round of the Club Battle in ''[[BW040|Cilan Versus Trip, Ash Versus Georgia!]]''. It finally evolved into Crustle during a battle against {{TRT}} in ''[[BW062|Crisis at Chargestone Cave!]]''.

====Other====
Three Dwebble appeared in ''[[BW011|A Home for Dwebble!]]'', where they bullied another {{TP|Cilan|Dwebble}} and stole its shell.

[[Burgh]] used a Dwebble in his Gym battle against {{Ash}} in ''[[BW023|Battling For The Love of Bug-Types!]]''. It defeated his {{AP|Tepig}} but then lost to his {{AP|Sewaddle}}.

A group of Dwebble appeared in ''[[M16|Genesect and the Legend Awakened]]'' at [[Pokémon Hills]]. They took a particular liking to [[Cilan's Crustle]].

===Minor appearances===
Multiple Dwebble appeared in ''[[BW069|Climbing the Tower of Success!]]''.

A Dwebble appeared in ''[[BW103|Curtain Up, Unova League!]]''.

==Trivia==
* No other Pokémon has the same [[Egg Group]] combination as Dwebble and its {{p|Crustle|evolution}}.
* Dwebble was leaked internationally in the [[Black and White (song)|opening]] for [[S14|Pokémon: Black & White]].

===Origin===
Dwebble is based on a {{wp|hermit crab}}, living within a hollowed out rock rather than a discarded {{wp|seashell}}.

====Name origin====
Dwebble may be a combination of ''dwell'' or ''dwelling'' and ''pebble''.

Ishizumai may be a combination of 石 ''ishi'' (stone) and 住まい ''sumai'' (dwelling/house), referring to its habitat.
